show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Health Chaos, American-Style
content:
The horrors of American healthcare laid bare. The ‘rationale’ for the high prices. Doctors’ incentives. <!--more--> The history of American health ‘insurance’.
The appalling scandal of medical errors which kill between 210,000 and 440,000 patients each year.
Medical ‘culture’.
Transportation has its Safety Board.
Why not medicine?
Overprescribing.
Obamacare doesn’t even pretend to cover the entire population.
More on unemployment.
(The percentage of Americans looking for work or working is the lowest in36 years).
One lie after another from the government and its mouthpiece, the main stream media.
Several statistics bring the point home.
According to a major new study, people who avoid carbohydrates and eat more fat, even saturated fat, lose more body fat and have fewer cardiovascular risks than people who follow the low-fat diet that health authorities have favored for decades.
The Chinese economy is about to implode.
You heard it here first!
  Their financial system is also almost certain to face a fully-blown banking crisis.
